metadata.title: CVE-2023-0594 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability.Starting with the 7.0 branch, Grafana had a stored XSS vulnerability in thetrace view visualization. The stored XSS vulnerability was possible due thevalue of a span's attributes/resources were not properly sanitized and thiswill be rendered when the span's attributes/resources are expanded. Anattacker needs to have the Editor role in order to change the value of atrace view visualization to contain JavaScript. This means that verticalprivilege escalation is possible, where a user with Editor role can changeto a known password for a user having Admin role if the user with Adminrole executes malicious JavaScript viewing a dashboard. Users may upgradeto version 8.5.21, 9.2.13 and 9.3.8 to receive a fix.

criterions.comment: grafana package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
